content.en: GPS AI Optimization: Researchers are exploring how artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms can improve the accuracy of GPS positioning during GPS outages. They are using techniques such as adaptive neuro-fuzzy inference systems, artificial neural networks, and machine learning to optimize the integration of GPS and inertial navigation systems (INS). These algorithms can predict and compensate for errors in GPS data, providing a robust navigation solution even when GPS signals are blocked.
content.da: GPS AI-optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan kunstig intelligens (AI)-algoritmer kan forbedre nøjagtigheden af GPS-positionering under GPS-udfald. De bruger teknikker som adaptive neuro-fuzzy inference systemer, kunstige neurale netværk og maskinlæring til at optimere integrationen af GPS og inertielle navigationssystemer (INS). Disse algoritmer kan forudsige og kompensere for fejl i GPS-data, hvilket giver en robust navigationsløsning, selv når GPS-signaler er blokeret.
